BreakBeat â€“ Audible Debugging for IntelliJ

Bring your debugging experience to life with BreakBeat, the IntelliJ plugin that plays custom sounds whenever your breakpoints are hit. Stay informed without constantly staring at your IDE!

Key Features:

  • Custom Sounds: Assign unique audio alerts to your breakpoints to differentiate events instantly.
  • Real-Time Updates: Change sounds while the debugger is running without restarting your IDE.
  • Easy Configuration: Quick and intuitive UI for managing sounds and volume.
  • Non-Intrusive: Lightweight and optimized to not interfere with your coding workflow.
